title: How to Log Out of Telegram on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Launch the Telegram app on your computer.
steps.content: Launch the Telegram app on your computer. It's a round icon depicting a paper flight in blue background. If you can't find it, search for “ Telegram ” in the Start menu (Windows) or Applications folder (macOS).

steps.title: Click on the menu icon.
steps.content: Click on the menu icon. You will see the ≡ triple bar icon on the top-left side of the app. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Settings menu.
steps.content: Open the Settings menu. Click on the Settings option, under the Calls text. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the ⋮ icon, at the top-right corner of the “Settings” tab.
steps.content: Click on the ⋮ icon, at the top-right corner of the “ Settings ” tab. Then, select Log Out from the context menu. [3] X Research source In the old version of the Telegram app, scroll all the way down and click on Log Out option. It's at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap LOG OUT when prompted.
steps.content: Tap LOG OUT when prompted. Doing so will log you out of the Telegram app. [4] X Research source To log in to your account again, click on START MESSAGING button and sign in with your account.
